description: Frieren and Heiter try the spell out on the taciturn Eisen. At first the spell doesn`t seem to have worked, but when they ask him about a recent battle, both his speech and his movements increase in speed. Frieren and Heiter conclude that it`s good for people to have their own manner of speech.

titles.title: Magic Episode 7: Magic to Speak Extremely Fast Without Faltering
Marumaru no Mahou Dai 7 Kai: Monosugoku Hayakuchi Yodominaku Shabereru Mahou
●●の魔法 第7回: ものすごく早口に澱みなく喋れる魔法
